root.mtext: In a Galaxy far far far away in the distant future, you are the Captain of an alliance battleship, trapped deep within enemy territory with Intelligence information that could finally put an end to this war. In order to make it back to Alliance space, you must successfully make many FTL jumps. Your navigational computer will display how many times that the enemy has the oppurtunity to stop you, and turn the tide of the war in their favor...
